mainSequence.step: User A initiates a transaction on the Polkadot Ledger through the API Client.
The API Client sends a request to the API Server.
The API Server forwards the transaction request to the Polkadot Ledger Connector.
The Polkadot Ledger Connector executes the transaction using the 'transact()' method.
The Polkadot Ledger Connector sends the response back to the API Server.
The API Server formats the response and sends it back to the API Client.
